pages.title: Bronze
pages.text: Bronze is the simplest alloy you can make. Obtained with copper and tin, is an alternative to Iron.$(br)Tools and armor made of this material are more durable than their iron counterpart, but not as strong or fast.$(br2)DURABILITY: $(l)LOW$()$(br)MINING SPEED: $(l)5$()$(br)ATTACK DAMAGE: $(l)5$()$(br)ENCHANTABILITY: $(l)MODERATE
Raw Bronze can be smelted into ingots either by a Furnace or a Blast Furnace. Tools and armor must be crafted using individual pieces of Bronze.
